column3:
“Holy Wow, this strain just blew me away from the first exhale. Theres an
 almost immediate sativa effect and the indica slowley settles in for a nice blend. Defintly top shelf bud”

“1st strain I've tried on my journey to rediscover Cannabis after about 25 years of no use.
Found the strain Uplifting and Mellow, not overwhelming with some mild euphoria. Felt relaxed and a peace with the world, which is not my usual state of mind.
Highly recommended for 1st timers or people who haven't used in awhile. 
I used  a Firefly 2 Vaporizer which is a new experience for me as well. Vape vs. Smoke. Enjoying ...”
“The best smelling/tasting weed ive ever experienced. Sometimes makes me lightheaded/dizzy but overall a good strong high for a hybrid.”
“8/10 Good blend of Sativa and Indica influence. It keeps clarity if used in small amounts. Becomes intoxicating after a few bowls. Great for stress and depression.”
“Absolutely fantastic. Great balance of Indica & Sativa effects. A really nice smoky cheesy aroma. Great for relaxing and focusing.”

“Holy Wow, this strain just blew me away from the first exhale. Theres an
 almost immediate sativa effect and the indica slowley settles in for a nice blend. Defintly top shelf bud”
“this shit gives me couch lock for like 20 minutes and then i can't stop moving around, i love waking and baking with this strain”
“Such a great strain!I was fascinated by the same moderate to strong head high I got every time.mines tasted more like diesel but yeah 4.5 out of 5”
“Absolutely fantastic. Great balance of Indica & Sativa effects. A really nice smoky cheesy aroma. Great for relaxing and focusing.”
“Tried it because of its name. And boy, did it live up to its name. Very heavy hybrid, very potent. Very nice mellow, balanced high. Has rich colors and flavor to it.”
“very strong smell, and has a strong head high. makes you stare off into space!”
“this weed puts a smile on my face as soon as it hits my presence”
“Rolled a pretty fat grape swisher. burned slow and got some big clouds with it. The high is a little bit mellow and I prefer a more intense high feeling”

“This strain tasted awesome carrying the way the flower smelled in the jar all the way to my tongue without missing a beat.  The terpenes in Holy Ghost Haze are very vibrant reminding of a sativa yet without an overwhelming animated sativa buzz.  One of the few strains I would suggest for depression because it rides the hybrid middleground very well without ever getting boring. The pain relief was limited so this bein...”
“First time trying it here in red deer alberta Canada and man I only had two hoots and I felt so good I didn't need anymore.”
“Butter. Pure and simple, I felt like a stick of warm melting butter. I will always love this strain. v”
